TopicTitle: Ideas for the New Secret Feature in 0.25!

Articles.Content:
Maxmaps's hint that nobody guessed it pretty cleanly rules out destructible buildings.

That said, nobody else has guessed dead Kerbals as far as I've seen...

Maxmaps's hint that nobody guessed it pretty cleanly rules out destructible buildings.

That said, nobody else has guessed dead Kerbals as far as I've seen...

Dead kerbals/splats was one of the first guesses, along with dest. buildings

Not guessed yet? So we have to think all over again ...

Something small as a byproduct of a bigger arts project ...

Not guessed yet? So we have to think all over again ...

Something small as a byproduct of a bigger arts project ...

That has not been done with any mod before....

That is giving me a hard time.

"We don't know what this is

Got us rack our brains

Just like you knew it would

We don't know what you do

but you do it well

We're under your spell.

You got us beggin' you for mercy

Why won't you release it"

Maxmaaaaaps!!!
Just so you guys don't go insane, by now it's been guessed. It'd be insane if with the combined brainpower behind it, some people hadn't nailed it squarely yet.
Such a tease!

Just so you guys don't go insane, by now it's been guessed. It'd be insane if with the combined brainpower behind it, some people hadn't nailed it squarely yet.

Will the person who guessed it win a no-prize?

Will the person who guessed it win a no-prize?

The prize will be all of Maxmap's love. All of it.
Looking at that .PNG pic, anyone else note the itty-bitty building to the left of the SPH? No doubt the new Admin building...

Will the person who guessed it win a no-prize?

A massive one.

Looking at that .PNG pic, anyone else note the itty-bitty building to the left of the SPH? No doubt the new Admin building...

Nope, that's a building to make the secret feature "happen more often". I noticed it a while back and called attention to it in the devnotes thread and since then it's been a big point of hype. Max said in a squadcast it was there only to make the feature happen more often. The admin building is in front of the VAB/Astronaut Complex.
Oh, so it's just a target for all the spaceplanes that veer to the right on takeoff.

Oh, so it's just a target for all the spaceplanes that veer to the right on takeoff.

Could be. Though I if that is the case it is going to annoy people more than help the feature. I have a concern that it will end up being the next launch tower for those that remember those versions.

... it is obviously a Graveyard ...

We're going to need a much bigger KSC...

Just so you guys don't go insane, by now it's been guessed. It'd be insane if with the combined brainpower behind it, some people hadn't nailed it squarely yet.

"I fear that the secret feature knower may be among us!"
If it isn't damageable buildings, then they should tell us now so we can stop the hype and get disappointment.

If it isn't damageable buildings, then they should tell us now so we can stop the hype and get disappointment.

If it is damageable buildings then they should tell us now so we can stop the hype and get disappointment.

As for my opinion? I think it's destructible buildings, but I think that is only part of the feature. The full scope would involve having to clean up after your crashes. This would involve destructible buildings while also making use of the Secret Feature Buildingtm as a fire-and-rescue team.

Just so you guys don't go insane, by now it's been guessed. It'd be insane if with the combined brainpower behind it, some people hadn't nailed it squarely yet.

But in which thread?! Oo

Who suggested destructible buildings first? My guess was here http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/91100-Devnote-Tuesdays-The-Can-t-Spell-Kerbal-without-K-Edition?p=1362432#post1362432 on Aug 20

It must be something that someone guessed in the last few hours!

Something to make the secret happen more often ...

A countdown thingy? But what would be the big .26 thingy and why would skilled players not see it?

A lightning arrester? Weather in .26?

This did nothing to relieve my stressed mind!

Squad was and is still deeply a PR company, they won't tell us what the secret feature is, that would totally go against their roots, and be nonsense before the release.

So take it with fun.
it says that the second gas planet is in development! Not for this update maybe, but that's still awesome!!!!!

it says that the second gas planet is in development! Not for this update maybe, but that's still awesome!!!!!

What does say this?

/perfectenglish
